Class GuiHudHelper

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.helpers.GuiHudHelper
public class GuiHudHelper extends Object
Helper class for HUD logic extracted from GuiController. Contains exact same code, just moved to separate file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GuiHudHelper(javafx.scene.text.Text scoreText, javafx.scene.text.Text levelText, javafx.scene.text.Text linesText, javafx.scene.text.Text comboText, javafx.scene.text.Text timerText, javafx.scene.text.Text progressText, javafx.scene.text.Text bestText, javafx.scene.text.Text modeText, javafx.scene.text.Text modeHintText)
    Creates a new HUD helper with all text components.

  • Constructor Details

    • GuiHudHelper

      public GuiHudHelper(javafx.scene.text.Text scoreText, javafx.scene.text.Text levelText, javafx.scene.text.Text linesText, javafx.scene.text.Text comboText, javafx.scene.text.Text timerText, javafx.scene.text.Text progressText, javafx.scene.text.Text bestText, javafx.scene.text.Text modeText, javafx.scene.text.Text modeHintText)
      Creates a new HUD helper with all text components.
      Parameters:
      scoreText - text component for score display
      levelText - text component for level display
      linesText - text component for lines display
      comboText - text component for combo display
      timerText - text component for timer display (may be null)
      progressText - text component for progress display (may be null)
      bestText - text component for best score/time display
      modeText - text component for mode display
      modeHintText - text component for mode hint display

  • Method Details

    • setMode

      public void setMode(GameMode mode)
      Sets the game mode and updates mode-related text displays.
      Parameters:
      mode - the game mode to set

    • bindScore

      public void bindScore(javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty scoreProperty)
      Binds the score property to the score text display.
      Parameters:
      scoreProperty - the score property to bind

      public void bindLevel(javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty levelProperty)
      Binds the level property to the level text display.
      Parameters:

      public void bindLines(javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty linesProperty)
      Binds the lines property to the lines text display.

    • bindCombo

      public void bindCombo(javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty comboProperty)
      Binds the combo property to the combo text display.
      Parameters:

    • clearProgressText

      public void clearProgressText()
      Clears the progress text display.

    • updateRushProgress

      public void updateRushProgress(int linesCleared, int targetLines)
      Updates the progress text for Rush mode.
      Parameters:
      linesCleared - the number of lines cleared so far
      targetLines - the target number of lines to clear

    • updateSurvivalStatus

      public void updateSurvivalStatus(int shields, int landingsUntilGarbage)
      Updates the progress text for Survival mode.
      Parameters:
      shields - the current number of shields
      landingsUntilGarbage - the number of landings until next garbage row

    • updateBestInfo

      public void updateBestInfo(GameMode mode, int finalScore, double rushCompletionSeconds)
      Updates best score and best Rush-40 time for the given mode. Called from GameController when a run ends.
      Parameters:
      mode - the game mode
      finalScore - the final score achieved
      rushCompletionSeconds - the completion time in seconds (for Rush mode)

    • refreshBestInfoForMode

      public void refreshBestInfoForMode(GameMode mode)
      Refreshes best info for the given mode without highlighting. Called when a new game starts so the player can see their targets.
      Parameters:
      mode - the game mode

    • setBestTextDefault

      public void setBestTextDefault()
      Sets the best text to default value.

    • clearTimerText

      public void clearTimerText()
      Clears the timer text display.
